summary: Provides a utility for converting written text into International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA) sequences, loading and normalizing language‑specific phoneme dictionaries, applying customizable symbol replacement rules, and handling tokenization and case transformations for multilingual text‑to‑speech applications.
business_intent: Facilitates accurate pronunciation generation in TTS pipelines across different locales, enhancing speech naturalness and intelligibility for end‑user products.
